note.content:
i would like to put down in writing what my intuitions are 
about the future of Mökki, the business model, the vision.

in my opinion, the model of Mökkispace in 
office buildings is what makes the most sense.

would you agree that, in the long run, the main revenue source will be 
partnerships with retail brands (le Closet, Percentil, etc.)
And also potentially selling data about our users\' behavior ?
for me, what has always been the most clear and convincing was the concept of promoting circular economy at work

i want to make the case for focusing on office buildings.
I see the appeal in developing new business models like the van or coffee-shops,
but what i fear is that it is less clear
